reviews.review: 说实话这游戏打排位才能看出水平，但是这游戏挂太多太多了，要想正常的玩根本不可能，基本每一局都会出现挂，挂，挂，挂，太多太多，如果想玩娱乐局倒是蛮可以。但是大家都是奔着正规游戏玩的，体验感真是差到极致。
the only game where all nations meet, this game made me hate russians and turks but i still love it because ive been playing cs for about 10+

The game is amazing, however the community can be a bit toxic sometimes. The solution is to play with friends, play casual or play on a private matchmaking service, like faceit or esl. The base mechanics and gameplay are amazing, with no shortage of players and servers for almost anyone. This is one of few games that I can play without 200 ping, which is amazing! Recommended if you have friends to play with, otherwise it's a bit frustrating. I love it though
because i am very pro in the game

It is  a very great game and by far the most popular online FPS of all time. I spent some time trying to figure out the recoil patterns of some guns but this game requires some serious skill to fully enjoy it. But overall I really liked the gameplay and the different game modes you can try. I really recommend this game a lot.
But the greatest thing about it is that it is free so you dont have to worry about spending money. although there is a hefty amount of microtransactions and in-game purchases like skins on weapons and mission packs. It s not necesarily a deal breaker but you might want to take that into consideration :)
It's a fun game if played with friends, even tho it can be frustratring at times.
Well known game. Plenty of fun.
